mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing the Happy Goodman Family at the Hot Springs Convention Auditorium on April 15. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/50511/
